title: Analysis: Here’s what to expect now that Musk owns Twitter
content:
Elon Musk’s the topic du jour, once again, as his teased takeover of Twitter has come to its inevitable end. It’s a done deal: the world’s richest man has purchased Twitter. Cue the Imperial March. While we’re all waiting to see what happens now, it’s worth speculating on what the ramifications of the soon-to-be completed takeover could mean. Here’s what we know so far: Musk intends to take the company private. He intends to change Twitter’s moderation practices. Going private Twitter is currently a publicly-traded company, but it’s almost certainly going to be in Musk’s best interests to take the…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Twitter
description: It's official: Elon Musk has purchased Twitter. Here's everything you can expect now that the town square is going private.
